CustomField.description: Quote Completed Date - Quote Submitted Date (excluding weekends)
CustomField.formula: Quote_Completed_Date__c - Quote_Submitted_Date__c- 2*( floor((Quote_Completed_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Quote_Submitted_Date__c- DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Quote Completed Date - Quote Submitted Date (excluding weekends)
CustomField.label: Days to Quote Complete
